Texts.Eng:
A mysterious race bearing a resemblance to ancient Earth demons. Not much is known of these creatures.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore, can eat raw meat.

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  When at least 50% fed, gain ^green;1.5^reset;% Health Regen
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;30^reset;% Cosmic, +^green;50^reset;% Shadow

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Shield+Pistol: Defense x^green;1.15^reset;
  (Machine) Pistol: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;50^reset;% Knockback Resist, +^green;0.25^reset;% Crit Chance^reset;

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Energy x^red;0.9^reset;, +^red;10^reset;% Hunger Drain
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;50^reset;% Fire
